channel.title: No Agenda
channel.itunes:author: Adam Curry & John C Dvorak
channel.description: A show about politics with No Agenda, by Adam Curry and John C. Dvorak
channel.itunes:subtitle: We have no agenda
channel.itunes:keywords: news, politics, agenda, elections, legislation, government, curry, dvorak
